from sys import stdin
input = stdin.readline
for _ in range(int(input())):
    (n, m) = map(int, input().split())
    print('W' + 'B' * (m - 1))
    for x in range(n - 1):

import sys

def main():
    res = ''
    input = sys.stdin.readline
    print = sys.stdout.write
    t = int(input())
    for _ in range(t):
        (n, m) = map(int, input().split())
        res += 'W' + 'B' * (m - 1) + ('\n' + 'B' * m) * (n - 1) + '\n'
    print(res)
main()

for _ in range(int(input())):
    (p, q) = map(int, input().split())
    print('W', end='')
    st = 'B' * (q - 1)
    print(st)
    st += 'B'
    for i in range(p - 1):
        print(st)

t = int(input())
for caso in range(t):
    first = [int(i) for i in str(input()).split()]
    n = first[0]
    m = first[1]
    print('W' + 'B' * (m - 1))
    for i in range(n - 1):
        print('B' * m)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    nums = input().split()
    n = int(nums[0])

        print('B' * m)
